name: LdapMachineInfoAnalyzer
author: 0lgvd
description: Analyzer to retrieve information about a machine by its name

configurationItems.name: LDAP_address
configurationItems.description: Should contain the protocol. Eg: ldaps://myldap.myorg.com

configurationItems.name: LDAP_port
configurationItems.description: Should contain the ldap port. Eg: 389 or 636

configurationItems.name: LDAP_username
configurationItems.description: Username of the account that will be used to bind to LDAP server. The Account should have permissions to read ldap objects and attributes.

configurationItems.name: LDAP_password
configurationItems.description: Password of the account used to bind to LDAP server.

configurationItems.name: base_DN
configurationItems.description: The base DN to use in your LDAP. Eg: dc=myorg,dc=com

configurationItems.name: cn_search_field
configurationItems.description: Specify here the field to use when searching by hostname. Eg: cn

configurationItems.name: attributes
configurationItems.description: Specify here the attributes you want to harvest. Eg: description, uid
